title: Assassin's Creed® Odyssey

notes: Had to install corefonts to get Uplay to show up but can't login to Uplay ("Connection Lost")
title: Assassin's Creed® Odyssey

notes: Uplay won't work at first, install MS corefonts in your distro and then do this: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/1757#issuecomment-431571624. After that the game will run but you might need to do something about your resolution; use winecfg to set a virtual resolution and solve that. If you use the Steam Controller softaware though, the virtual resolution fix caused an issue with it, I re-purposed the Desktop Profile to go around that, not the cleanest solution but it worked. Hopefully by the time Proton rebases itself against Wine again those workarounds won't be needed anymore.
title: Assassin's Creed® Odyssey
